body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, farmer. Fleming County native. Son of John Harman and Mary Harman. Married to Sarah Kearns Harmon in Fleming County on October 15, 1852. Father of Mary Harmon, Bruce Harmon, and William Harmon. Farmer in Fleming County in 1860.
